Type IFakeAccessor

Namespace Machine.Fakes

Accessor interface for dependencies created and managed by fake framework / auto fake container.

TInterfaceType The<TInterfaceType>()

Creates a fake of the type specified by . This method reuses existing instances. If an instance of was already requested it's returned here. (You can say this is kind of a singleton behavior) Besides that, you can obtain a reference to automatically injected fakes with this method.
Return
TInterfaceType

An instance implementing .
